name: Seekrz
description: A live mobile application available on both App Store and Play Store, designed for users and store owners across multiple locations. Features trade offers between stores, automated trade handling, and comprehensive payment integrations.
features: Trade offer system between stores with auto-cancel after 48 hours
Multiple payment gateway integrations (Stripe, ACH, Apple Pay, Cash Pay)

name: Cellcast
description: Australia-based project focused on bulk SMS communication and client engagement solutions. Enables businesses to send and manage bulk SMS campaigns with credit management and transactional transparency.
features: Stripe payment gateway for top-ups and subscriptions
SMS credit and user balance management

name: Pondir
description: Platform built from scratch using Node.js for online course management, similar to Udemy model. Features comprehensive agency module, mastermind modules, and Facebook integration for revenue generation.
features: Complex API responses using MongoDB Aggregation Pipelines

name: Speech Therapy Medical Application
description: Medical application developed using NestJS focusing on secure patient data handling, appointment scheduling, and session management for speech therapy services.

name: Austin Indian
description: Community platform to help Indians in Austin, Texas find local Indian restaurants easily. Features comprehensive search and filtering capabilities to connect the Indian community with local businesses.
features: Complete backend APIs for search and filtering
Easy navigation for Indian community in Austin
